metadata.title: How to Add YouTube Subtitles 2025: Captions & Translations Guide
metadata.description: Add subtitles to YouTube videos. Auto-captions, manual upload, and translation strategies.

hero.headline: How to Add YouTube Subtitles
hero.subheadline: Reach more viewers with captions. Accessibility and SEO benefits.

sections.content: Subtitles dramatically expand your audience—viewers watching without sound, non-native speakers, deaf and hard-of-hearing communities, and ESL learners. Captions also improve SEO since YouTube indexes caption text. Here's how to add them effectively.

content.title: Auto-Generated
content.description: YouTube creates automatically. Good starting point, needs editing.

content.title: Manual Upload
content.description: Upload SRT file. Most accurate. Time-consuming.

content.title: Type Alongside
content.description: Type in YouTube Studio. Syncs to audio automatically.

content: Open YouTube Studio, go to video
Choose method: auto-sync, type, or upload

content.title: Edit Auto-Captions
content.description: Never leave auto-captions unedited. Fix errors, add punctuation.

content.title: Add Translations
content.description: Translated captions expand global reach. Use professional translation.

content.title: Format for Readability

sections.title: Subtitle Benefits
content: Viewers watching without sound (80%+ on mobile)

faq.question: Are auto-captions good enough?
faq.answer: No—always edit. Auto-captions have errors that look unprofessional and hurt accessibility. 5-10 minutes editing is worth it.

faq.question: Do captions help SEO?
faq.answer: Yes. YouTube indexes caption text for search. Accurate captions with keywords naturally included improve discoverability.

faq.question: Should I add other languages?
faq.answer: If you have international audience, yes. Check Analytics for viewer locations. Professional translation recommended over auto-translate.

faq.question: How to add captions faster?
faq.answer: Tools like Descript or Rev.com transcribe accurately. Edit their output, export SRT, upload to YouTube. Faster than manual.
